long_description: The men's REI Fleet Long-Sleeve T-Shirt moves well and manages moisture, so you can stay comfortable on long training runs. Polyester fabric wicks sweat, dries fast and provides 4-way stretch for easy movement. Fabric also has a UPF 20 sun protection rating. Mesh panels on sides and along the sleeves increase ventilation. Flat seams and raglan shoulder design enhance your comfort level. Reflective details boost visibility in low light. The men's REI Fleet Long-Sleeve T-Shirt has an active fit that provides a full range of motion.
short_description: The men's REI Fleet Long-Sleeve T-Shirt moves well and manages moisture, so you can stay comfortable on long training runs.
